comments:
I downloaded 3.0M6 and unzipped it to C:\eclipse using the Windows XP unzipper 
on my HP pavillion 7955.  When I double-clicked on eclipse.exe to start it, it 
popped up a dialog saying:

  Problems during startup. Check the ".log" file
  in the ".metadata" directory of your workspace.

This happens each time I try to launch it.

Here are the contents of the .log file eclipse generated:
